sources.title: BACK STAGE (1919) -- Roscoe Arbuckle, Buster Keaton, Al St. John
sources.description: BACK STAGE (1919) Starring: Roscoe Arbuckle, Buster Keaton, Al St. John, Molly Malone, John Coogan, Alice Lake Written and Directed by Arbuckle Comique Film Corporation, Paramount Wm. Thomas Sherman, wts@gunjones.com, http://www.mn-hp.com

metadata.Plot: Roscoe and Buster are working at a vaudeville house. When the crew attacks the strongman for bullying his assistant, the man goes out on strike so the crew puts on a show. When the strongman starts shooting from the balcony, Buster rigs a swing, picks him up, and takes him to the stage where is again subdued.
metadata.Actors: Roscoe 'Fatty' Arbuckle, Buster Keaton, Al St. John
